translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions for the Doctrinal Expositions

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)🔽12.15. Saraṇaduka, Cūḷantaraduka🔽Nasaraṇaṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  saraṇaduka cūḍantaraduka  na saraṇam na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na asaṅkhatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  na saraṇam na sanidassanam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  na saraṇam na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  na saraṇam na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Two-Doorways, the Shorter Chapter on the Internal

original: Nasaraṇaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na saraṇam na rūpim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: With respect to a non-doorway condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-culmination condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-unification condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-determining condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-path condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-direct-knowledge condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-fruition condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-causally-related condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-unrelated condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-arising condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-non-arising condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-arising-together condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-non-arising-together condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-arising condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-non-arising condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-arising-together condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-non-arising-together condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-arising-later condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-non-arising-later condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-arising-simultaneously condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-non-arising-simultaneously condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-arising-immediately-before condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-non-arising-immediately-before condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-arising-immediately-after condition … With respect to a non-doorway, non-pendent-on-non-arising-immediately-after

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na arūpim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: … a non-perilous, not-formless … (Abbreviated.) … with a root cause, one … with an outlet, one.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca  na saraṇam na lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: … a non-perilous, not-supermundane …🔽… a non-perilous, supermundane … (Abbreviated.) … with a root cause, five … with an object, two … with a condition, one … with an outlet, five.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: … a non-perilous, cognizable by one kind of knowledge … a non-perilous, not cognizable by one kind of knowledge … (Abbreviated.) … with a root cause, five … with an object, two … with a condition, one … with an outlet, five.
